headline: Tunnel: Cloudflare’s Newest Homeowner
keywords: Cloudflare Tunnel, Zero Trust, Product News, Cloudflare Zero Trust, Research
description: Starting today, users who deploy and manage Cloudflare Tunnel at scale now have easier visibility into their Tunnel’s respective status, routes, uptime, connectors, cloudflared version, and much more through our new UI in the Cloudflare for Teams Dashboard.
